Articles.Content: Hey everyone, i am new here and i dont know how to post screenshots or do anything useful at all. Could you send me a message and help me out, please?

Hey Commander T,

Just so you know, your first few posts need to be approved by a moderator (to make sure you aren't a robot).

Anyway, if you want to post a screenshot, you need to use a file hosting site like imgur.com, photobucket.com, or any other similar place. A lot of people use imgur.com because you can build albums and embed them here.

If you just want to post an image, then surround it with IMG tags like this: [noparse][/noparse]

See an example album below. (Also, moved to forum help.)

~Claw

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Looks like, I'll give it a try with dropbox http://www.dropbox.com/sc/85k8479rr4hz3du/AAB9EYvUhy3kASkGY7KJ-m9xa

EDIT- LOL guess dropbox don't work the same ? EDIT- yep just not as a share photo from dropbox but as a file share it works.

EDIT-

Edited August 28, 2014 by Mecripp2
Yeah, not sure why dropbox won't let you direct-link photo shares in that way. I've avoided using the photos folder of my dropbox for that very reason xD
